mapper.select: select hi.*, (hi.after_count-hi.before_count) subCount, m.machine_code, goods.name goodsName, CONCAT( aa.province, aa.city, aa.district,IFNULL(l.mall,""),IFNULL( l.name,'') ) AS localeStr from inno72_supply_channel_history hi inner join inno72_machine m on hi.machine_id=m.id inner join inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id inner join inno72_admin_area aa ON aa.CODE = l.area_code inner join inno72_goods goods on hi.goods_id=goods.id where hi.batch_no=#{batchNo} and hi.after_count>0 and hi.after_count != hi.before_count
